AkEnvironment::AkEnvironment_CompareBySelectionAlgorithm

AkEnvironment::AkEnvironment_CompareBySelectionAlgorithm Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The selection algorithm is as follow: 1. Environments have priorities (already the case) 2. Environments have a "Default" flag. This flag effectively says that this environement will be bumped out if any other is present. 3. Environements have a "Exclude Other" flag. This flag will tell that this env is not overlappable with others. So only one (the highest priority) should be selected.
